results.title: [Oxidation stress, insulin resistance and endothelial dysfunction during the treatment of hyperlipidaemia].
results.text_hl: METHODS AND RESULTS: For the period of twelve months 46 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with primary @<m>DISEASE_Hyperkeratosis_lenticularis_perstans</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C538377 @@@HLP@@@ (group S) (LDL-C > 4.1 mmol/l a @CHEMICAL_Thioguanine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013866 @@@TG@@@ < 3.5 mmol/l), were treated with @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatine@@@ 20 mg or @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatine@@@ 40 mg.

citations.NLM: Zeman M, Vecka M, Stopka P, Zahin M, Tvrzická E, Stanková B, Vareka T, Janíková L, Zák A. [Oxidation stress, insulin resistance and endothelial dysfunction during the treatment of hyperlipidaemia]. Cas Lek Cesk. 2006;145(12):923-8. PMID: 17323614
